thread.title: Rockland Golf Club abuzz with plenty of recent activity
thread.title_full: Rockland Golf Club abuzz with plenty of recent activity

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Rockland Golf Club abuzz with plenty of recent activity
text:
Rockland Golf Club abuzz with plenty of recent activity Bonzagni ace, president's cup, business, women's, Irish Open play on course By Staff | Oct 06, 2015 
Rockland â€” A hole-in-one and plenty of other tournament play was the scenario in recent Rockland Golf Club play. 
Mike Bonzagni recorded his second career hole-in-one on Monday, Sept. 28 on the 136-yard, par-3 fifth hole. He used an 8-iron for his tee shot, which was witnessed by Rob Jongerden, Rob Splaine and Larry Schooley. 
In president's cup play, a tournament that goes through much of the summer, Rob Splaine finished as the champion as he beat Larry Schooley, 1-up in 20 holes. 
On Saturday, Sept. 26 in the Irish Open, in the men's Flight 1, James Anderson and Jamie Boutin finished first gross 65 and Benji Blake and Heath Commeau first net 52.5; in the men's Flight 2, Shawn Hiller and Andrew Rogers finished first gross 72 and Bill Bachofner and Bob Wiggins first net 55; in the mixed flight, George Carpenter and Judy Orne finished first gross 75 and Karl Kehler and Martha Bouchard first net 57.50; and in the women's flight, Nikki Boutin and Kim Felt first gross 83 and Jan Bradeen and Joanna Schleif first net 64.50. 
Bob Rector and Tom Levasseur finished with the highest score. 
On Friday, Sept. 25 in the couples 9 and dine event, a nine-hole scramble, John Frye, Cheryl Frye, Ray Felt and Kim Felt finished first gross 31 and Ed Gagnon, Susan Beal and Kate Hewlett first net 19. 
The pin winners were: Pat Griffith, 17-9 on the the 18th for women; and Scott Simpson, 16-7 on the 18th for men. 
On Thursday, Sept. 24 in men's business league, an individual points format, Justin Brownell finished first at +8, Andrew Rogers second at +6, Paul Frantz and Mark Anderson tied for third at +4, Dana White and Rick Erickson tied for fifth at +3, James Anderson seventh at +1 and Jason Willis, Scott Arsenault, Mike Williams and Steve Brooks tied for eighth at even. 
The pin winner was: Jason Willis, 6-8 on the fifth hole. 
On Thursday, Sept. 24, in women's association play, a Vegas/roll the dice event, Madolin Fogarty, Jan Staples and Joyce Cooley finished first at 63, Bobbi Andrus, Marty Jones and Cathy Hannamann second at 65 and Jean Brown, Jan Bradeen, Karen Hardy and Kathy Macpherson third at 69. 
The pin winners were: Martha Bouchard, 13-2.5 on the 10th; and Cathy Hannamann, 8-3 on the 18th.
